parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. In compliance with [RFC 7231](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231), the backend service must return a response based on the language used by the user.

*   No default value.
*   zh-CN: Chinese
*   en-US: English

parameters.name: CorsJSON
parameters.description: The information about the CORS policy.

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the associated record.
